From: Kristina Kalcheva <Kristina.Kalcheva@Loccitane.Me>

Cc: Mohammad Munir <mohammad.munir@chalhoub.com>; Shibu Janardhanan <Shibu.Janardhanan@chalhoub.com>; Sajumon Shanmughan <Sajumon.Shanmughan@chalhoub.com>; Kawttar Nassik <Kawttar.Nassik@chalhoub.com>; L'Occitane En Provence Dubai Mall <LOccitane.FlagShipDubaiMall@Loccitane.me>; Muhammed Sweadan <Muhammed.Sweadan@chalhoub.com>; Retail Maintenance <RetailMaintenance@chalhoub.com>; Daniele Bueno <Daniele.Bueno@loccitane.me>
Subject: RE: Update :- Loccitane TDM Facade wall tile crack issue - (Quotes, action plan & Feedback)

 

Dear Sreeraj,

 

Thanks on this!

 

In terms of Projects, we are okay to go with the matching similar tiles, as long we confirm the sample prior installation.  Also, can you confirm if we need to change whole wall with new tiles, or only the damaged part.

In terms of the cost quality of works, would you be able to check with Scale team too? They have built some of our stores, so they already know the specifics of our materials, so it would be good to consider them too.

 

For the insurance and cost, I will let RSO and Retail team to advise,

 

Regards,

 

 

KRISTINA KALCHEVAâ€‹â€‹â€‹â€‹

MANAGER â€‘ VISUAL MERCHANDISER

Mobile: 0502368603 <tel:0502368603>

Subject: Update :- Loccitane TDM Facade wall tile crack issue - (Quotes, action plan & Feedback)

 

Dear Randa, Kristina,

 

Hope all is well.

 

Attached are the repair quotes received for the crack tile rectification works required in Loccitane Dubai Mall.

 

FaÃ§ade Tile supply (*brand supplier) 

As per the brand supplier, the old model of tiles that were supplied to the brand has been discontinued, and they are proposing a new model as per the latest brand standard design.

chunks.text:
FaÃ§ade Tile supply (*brand supplier) 

As per the brand supplier, the old model of tiles that were supplied to the brand has been discontinued, and they are proposing a new model as per the latest brand standard design.

Randa, you will have to confirm if it is fine to proceed with this new model with the Brand itself, and accordingly we can get the finalized proposal from them with the correct quantities.

 

FaÃ§ade Tile removing & fixing new tiles (*FM supplier)

We have received two competitive proposals for the civil works related to demolishing the existing cracked tiles and carting away, also the installation of supplied tiles to the faÃ§ade wall , which also includes temporary hoardings as per mall guidelines.

Cost breakdown as below:-

CUBE (*Brand Fit out contractor)                       - AED 29,625/- (exc. VAT)

SOUTHERN INTERIORS (*FM contractor)         -AED 30,000/- (exc. VAT)

 

We recommend our FM contractor Southern Interiors as they are reliable vendor with proper quality work. Cube on the other hand, is no longer working with 3D projects team sighting to work quality issues in the past.

chunks.text:
We recommend our FM contractor Southern Interiors as they are reliable vendor with proper quality work. Cube on the other hand, is no longer working with 3D projects team sighting to work quality issues in the past.

Also as per latest attached email from Emaar, they are not acknowledging any responsibility in this case. Our FM recommendation would be for the brand to claim this cost via our insurance and not wait for any further and damage other sections, as we could notice some minor cracks originating in the front section of the faÃ§ade. In order for us to proceed with this way, we would first require an incident report to be issued by the Mall Ops. Hence, let us know how you would like us to proceed with initiating this request , in this scenario.

 

Feel free to reach out if you have any queries or remarks. ðŸ˜Š
